          <title>
            <string language="en">Plants need minerals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betriebsnotwendigkeit Mineralien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Minerais du besoin d'usines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Minerais da necessidade das plantas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Minerali di bisogno delle piante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταλλεύματα ανάγκης εγκαταστάσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Minerales de la necesidad de las plantas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the minerals plants need in order to grow: nitrogen, potassium, phosphorus, magnesium and sulphur.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">minerals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nitrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">phosphorus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plant growth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potassium</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die 
Mineralbetriebsnotwendigkeit, um zu wachsen: Stickstoff, Kalium,
Phosphor, Magnesium und Schwefel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que le besoin d'usines 
de minerais se développait : azote, potassium, phosphore, 
magnésium et soufre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a necessidade das plantas
de minerais a fim crescer: nitrogênio, potassium, phosphorus, 
magnésio e enxôfre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il bisogno delle 
piante dei minerali per svilupparsi: azoto, potassio, fosforo, 
magnesio e zolfo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ανάγκη εγκαταστάσεων 
μεταλλευμάτων προκειμένου να αυξηθεί: άζωτο, κάλιο, 
φώσφορος, μαγνήσιο και θείο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la necesidad de las 
plantas de los minerales para crecer: nitrógeno, potasio, 
fósforo, magnesio y sulfuro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mineralien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stickstoff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
